content.query:
CREATE TABLE dbo.VehicleAverages
( 
    [AverageEngineTemperature] [float] NOT  NULL,
    [AverageSpeed] [float] NOT  NULL,
    [Snapshot] [datetime] NOT  NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'asacosmosdbu6yr2x0'))
    THROW 50000, 'As a prerequisite, create a credential with Azure Cosmos DB key in SECRET option:
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [asacosmosdbu6yr2x0]
    WITH IDENTITY = ''SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE'', SECRET = ''<Enter your Azure Cosmos DB key here>''', 0
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=asacosmosdbu6yr2x0;Database=CustomerProfile',
                OBJECT = 'OnlineUserProfile01',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'asacosmosdbu6yr2x0'
) AS [OnlineUserProfile01]

CREATE TABLE dbo.VehicleAverages
( 
    [AverageEngineTemperature] [float] NOT  NULL,
    [AverageSpeed] [float] NOT  NULL,
    [Snapshot] [datetime] NOT  NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

CREATE TABLE dbo.table1
(
empid int not null,
name nvarchar(20) not null,
country nvarchar(10) not null,
department int not null
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

source:
# Read from Cosmos DB analytical store into a Spark DataFrame and display 10 rows from the DataFrame
# To select a preferred list of regions in a multi-region Cosmos DB account, add .option("spark.cosmos.preferredRegions", "<Region1>,<Region2>")

df = spark.read\
    .format("cosmos.olap")\
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", "CosmosDBLSCustomerProfile")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.container", "OnlineUserProfile01")\
    .load()

display(df.limit(10))

unwanted_cols = {'_attachments','_etag','_rid','_self','_ts','collectionType','id'}

# Remove unwanted columns from the columns collection
cols = list(set(df.columns) - unwanted_cols)

profiles = df.select(cols)

display(profiles.limit(10))

source:
# Read from Cosmos DB analytical store into a Spark DataFrame and display 10 rows from the DataFrame
# To select a preferred list of regions in a multi-region Cosmos DB account, add .option("spark.cosmos.preferredRegions", "<Region1>,<Region2>")

df = spark.read\
    .format("cosmos.olap")\
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", "CosmosDBLSCustomerProfile")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.container", "OnlineUserProfile01")\
    .load()

display(df.limit(10))

import uuid

# Generate random GUID
runId = uuid.uuid4()

topPurchases = df.select(
    "CustomerId", "ProductId",
    "Quantity")

# Populate a temporary view so we can query from SQL
topPurchases.createOrReplaceTempView("top_purchases")

topPurchases.show(10)

import uuid

# Generate random GUID
runId = uuid.uuid4()
